item.title: 2018-10-19 解决Markdown图片问题
item.description: [TOC] 终于解决了Markdown写博客的图片问题 使用python写了个脚本，生成文件的缩略图。 接下来我又添加的每次打开Helper时，自动提交git，得到最新的图片 使用方法： upload your pictures to github or gitee this script can generate latest 100 picture links click the thumb picture, then the link is clipped into you clipboard then use Ctrl+V in your own Markdown Enjoy! """ ############################################################################ Introduction: please upload your local picture folder as a repo in github or gitee(China). then we can use the image link in our own markdown file It's really helpful when you regularly write a blog use Markdown.
